name: Zollowers
description:
Description

You are a policeman surrounded by a horde of zombies that came from nowhere. As it is impossible to fight them all, running is your only chance to escape.

How to play

This is an Amstrad videogame that can be played in a real Amstrad CPC or in an emulator. In this case, we recommend you to play it in WinApe or Retro Virtual Machine (RVM).

Further details about how to play in Amstrad or emulator in the user manual.

Controls

In the menu, use the numbers shown next to each option to navigate them.

In the game, you can move the character with this keys:

  • O: Move Left
  • P: Move Right
  • Q: Move Up
  • A: Move Down

You can also use a joystick to move the character.

Gesture

Our game includes a gesture to Larcenas Legacy by Los Pollos Amigos. There is a chance that a special zombie appears instead of a normal zombie. The skin of this special zombie is inspired by one of the characters of Larcenas Legacy. It might appear at any level with normal zombies.
